website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some known quirks, this is a speedy, affordable flash drive with ample space for photos and videos.
pros: Provides 128 GB for a low price
Has a durable feel, thanks to the metal casing
Offers privacy and security features for protecting downloads
cons: Some disks arrived faulty, and others stopped working after several uses
App is a bit confusing to follow

customer_reviews.title: Great Drive at an unbelievable price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Drive at a price that you cannot pass up! I have lost 2 other iPhone lightning flash drives because they were too small and narrow. I know people like stuff compact, but after losing 2 not me. I like that I can actually see the drive with the naked eye! It transfers files very fast both to and from my computer and iPhone, and the Y-Disk app for the iPhone worked right off with no problems. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends for sure. I also will purchase another one soon for my daughter and wife.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: The Flashdrive is Small and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this little device, and found it very powerful for the functions it performs. It REALLY performs three functions in-1! It is also strong, because it is made of aluminum. No more overloading in my iPhone 7! I am using it with my iPad 3 too, and it works great! Great deal for the price! I am happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: An AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This drive works as expected. The App is easy to follow. That should be enough an endorsement. A video will play to completion which was not the case with another inexpensive USB 3.0 drive I bought. A pdf magazine file is also quickly loaded and displayed. So far there are no "cons" to this drive. For the price you cannot go wrong. Order one and try it for yourself. 128 GB is a lot of storage and the App makes the files seem like they're in the iPad's memory. The Amazon add says you can return it for free if not satisfied. Seems like a no lose deal to me. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Goff

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive is awesome! I'm able to get everything off of my old iPhone 6s and also my LG android. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Way To Expand
customer_reviews.text: The only off putting of this device is i have to take my case off to use it on my iphone 6s other than that i love it. i love that its universal and the luv share installs instantly after putting it in the phone. it fits snug and doesnt fall out. lets you see your storage as well as lets you make folders and sending stuff over is a piece of cake. i hope this lasts along time cause i love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Danyale Nees

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: The Flash Drive actually works as advertised. However, the Y-Disk software is necessary, and is not maintained. File association is potentially a problem since there is no "Open In" option. Standard document types are okay. Streaming is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love how small it is and easy to transfer pictures and videos
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: I love having all of my media in one place with the ability to access it on more than one operating system.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy To use
customer_reviews.text: Added memory To I pad which was greatly needed , very easy To use
customer_reviews.author: Luis Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great way to back up cell phone pictures to free memory on phone
customer_reviews.text: Quick and pretty intuitive to use. Arrived promptly. Attractive design and a very necessary function for my small amount of phone memory. It doesn't fit with an Otterbox Defender case, and I don't like to take the case off the phone. So, like my mom did, I also bought a 1 foot cable extender on Amazon. Used them as soon as they arrived yesterday. Backed up over 800 pictures and videos. Great way to transfer to your PC, or even print them, if you like.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This Flash drive works great for saving photos, contacts and files from your Iphone. You need to get the app first, which is free. From there it is literally plug and go. I had quite a few photos on my phone, so it took about 5 minutes to complete. I then plugged in to my laptop to double check that everything copied to the flash drive and sure enough there it was. This is a great way to free up space on your phone on the go without having to plug in to a computer or buy more space on the cloud!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Gronley

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome. I just loaded up 400 photos in just a matter of minutes. There’s plenty of storage, it’s a nice size, and the price is great. I just wish it came in different colors but that’s okay. It’s very easy to use. Just download the app, plug it into your phone and copy photos/videos over. Piece of cake. And the fact that you can use it for more than one type of phone is amazing. I’ll be getting more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gray

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.text: Received the flash drive in excellent condition. Good direction on how to use it. It would help if the included manual were available online so I wouldn't have to use a magnifying glass to read it. (Getting old's a b***h.) This device is iPhone on one end and USB on the other. It's a little difficult to insert the USB end in my PC, but doable with a little body English. No trouble to insert into iPhone, though. This should come in handy to move .docx files from iPhone to PC for printing without having to put them on the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara V.

customer_reviews.title: It’s compatible with all iOS devices.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea that while taking pictures with my iPhone or iPad, the images can be stored directly on to the external drive. This frees up the memory on my device and iCloud account.
customer_reviews.author: Frank & Rosemarie Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to save the files pictures and videos
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product with beautiful color and the size is handy, it can carry with us and save our pictures, videos, and important files instantly. Two way port for Iphone, Android and to the laptops user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPad Mini 2 with only 16gb of storage, so I've been looking for something to store movies on for a while. This works! I tried an external cable with a standard USB, but Apple's restriction on power usage made that idea fail. This reads and plays directly from the USB fast, quick, and easy. If you're looking for external storage, this is a great find.
customer_reviews.author: HapMa

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit with Otterbox case on
customer_reviews.text: One of the problems with this item is it does not fit in my iPod with the Otterbox case on. Also, I purchased the 128 gb and after I received it, I found out they offered a 256 gb for almost the same price. Not sure if I'm doing something wrong, but when I tried to put music on there directly from my iPod, it did not work. It does, however, make transferring photos very quick and easy. While transferring music from the computer to the flash drive, the music did download to the drive, but I was unable to upload it to the iPod. Maybe it's me. I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Photos take years to download from iCloud. It isn’t clear what app I should download to even upload my photos to the USB. There’s one referenced on amazon, one in the manual, and one when you plug in the device. App is not very friendly visually. I would rather just buy storage on iCloud. Also there’s some false advertisement. It advertises 128 GB but when I plugged in the device without adding any photos to it it was 119 GB (see photos). I simply don’t have time to download 6,900 photos one by one which takes 3-5 minutes each. I’ll be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Madisyn

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Don’t purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!! Backed up everything and next time went to do a backup and entire thing was deleted! Won’t backup and device shuts down each time! Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: LJE

customer_reviews.title: Free app to download
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. You have to download an app to use it. Still working on it to figure out how it works. Therefore I only gave it a 4 Star .
customer_reviews.author: Anne Homes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Little Gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this little pink (colour I chose) gadget literally SAVED my iPhone!!! I was dangerously close to running out of memory when I found this flash drive. It is super easy to use, basically, download the corresponding app to your phone, then plug and play! Easy as one, two, three. And the speed and capacity of it is awesome! I can't believe I had never thought of this, before! I totally recommend it to anyone who -like me- is a photo and music junkie! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aishwaryame

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time - Not compatible with my Iphone 7
customer_reviews.text: The item that I received is only a 2 in 1 item. Sold by Amazon as a 3 in 1. Amazon recommends to use the Y Disk app from the Apple Store. The app does not recognize the device. Once the device is plug into my Iphone 7 it kept telling me to connect the USB, not recognize. Strange that it would tell me to connect the USB when I had to connect the device to the lighting slot. Had a chat session with Amazon support for this item it seems that they didn't have an answer for the issue either. I gave up, flash drive going back to Amazon tomorrow morning.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Poma

customer_reviews.title: Most useful product I've bought in a while
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with the best way to backup my photos from my iPhone (in addition to a regular backup) and this little device is a WINNER. Simple to use with an app to download and violá. The only downside (and it's a very small downside) is that it's not really fast, especially the first time you do a backup. It took many hours and drained my battery pretty quickly. Otherwise, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work as described
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work. The Y Disk app was added, the pictures and content of my phone transferred to the app, but the USB could not be detected. The product is very cheaply made. Hard to insert as well. Very dissatisfied. Requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this - doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This drive doesn’t work at all! I plugged it in, re-downloaded the app several times, and nothing! It doesn’t show ANY files on my iPad. It flashes quickly and then a blank screen. I was really hoping it would work. Flimsy junk.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: 10% storage claimed
customer_reviews.text: The item description claims 128 gb storage. This item was easy to set up and had app downloaded and back-up started in three min. I have 15.4 gb of photos/videos on my phone. It took two hours to “complete” the back-up. When reviewing it only backed up less than half my files in those two hours. 15.4 gb is too much for a drive claiming 128 gb storage space?? You get what you pay for.. In this case you get far less for the money. Wiping and returning. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: inky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent new article to finally free up iPhone space
customer_reviews.text: Bothe the 128gb stick for iOS and its accompanying app work excellently right out of the box, without requiring prior knowledge. An amazingly low price for this wonderful item makes backing up your iPhone and freeing valuable space on the phone a snap: the app lets you choose what you want backed up and gone from the Apple phone -- and even offers to use the phone's camera for pics that will be placed into the stick immediately. All in all, a great value for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - stopped working almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I know in the description I said it stopped working, but that’s not entire accurate because it barely worked correctly from the start. It was really complicated to use, wouldn’t transfer / copy more than 30 files at the same time If I even got lucky enough that it let me select that many items. Once I’d plug it into my computer maybe half of the items were there. Then as time when by it got worse. I plug it into my iPad now and there is not even an option to move files over anymore, it just died completely. This was literally a waste of money, and an awful product. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Lover

customer_reviews.title: NOT comparable to Picture Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I just wasted $28.00. Right away, this item did not take all the pics off my IPad like advertised. My computer said it had a virus. Tried to clean it up, kept getting errors. It was not the easiest to use! Should have stuck with Picture Keeper which does what it advertises even though it is about 3 times as expensive and not as much GB. You get what you pay for, i guess. Very unhappy. My fault in not returning within the allotted time.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Some issues with this
customer_reviews.text: It seems that this device was pretty straight forward to use. But, the app is kinda generic and it keeps giving me error messages when trying to download my photos from my phone. It downloaded some photos but, can't seem to do the rest. Not sure if its full already, (shouldn't be) or there is some other issue. I'm going to attempt more troubleshooting to get it to work. The instructions are kinda janky, like whoever printed them doesn't speak very good English.
customer_reviews.author: rebagirl38

customer_reviews.title: I’m so upset
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to make transferring 4K video from my phone to my laptop faster. First off, it took a long time to upload everything onto the flash drive Then when it was all on it I put the flash drive in my computer and only like a tenth of the files transferred! I could see them all in the app, but not on my laptop I tried it again and out of the 500 pictures I had that “uploaded” 10 were fine on the computer, about 50 files were “corrupted” and the rest are just flat out gone. This is a HUGE waste of money. I’m so annoyed
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: Allows versatile file sharing for a Trio of Retired Music teachers!
customer_reviews.text: I am able to move edited mp3 files from my PC to my iphone notes folder and use the bluetooth speaker to play my accompaniment for a trio of retired teachers who take our shows to churches, retirement homes and friends' parties. We edit the music on the PC to fit our needs and ranges, and then organize the songs into sets. The files are too large to email or to move to an icloud account because we need them on several iphones and we need a backup file just in case. It works great. I can put a 2G music file on the flash drive and plug it right into my iphone. Now we are mobile. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: CU

customer_reviews.title: If you only read one review read this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I’ve gotten at Amazon. All those good reviews you see are because the company offers to send you another stick for free if you give them a good review. They’re essentially buying people off. Shameful. The app you need for this stick to work has 2 stars in the App Store. That’s how bad it is. Instructions are terrible and once you figure things out and start downloading you realize you can’t access/play any of the things you took so long to download. IT IS TERRIBLE. Please trust this sincere reviewer and don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Aponte

customer_reviews.title: So Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the flash drive for my granddaughters phone because she only has 64G. I helped her backup her pictures on the flash drive. It was very simple to download the app and put the pictures on there. From the installation point on the flash drive will automatically backup the pics. I'm buying one for husband who does have access to a computer during the day. Also, another one for my ipad. The access to a computer frequently is one factor that will make someone need this flash drive. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CindyH529

customer_reviews.title: Shady
customer_reviews.text: At first I was really excited to have a product that I can easily download my pictures. But despite the 5 star reviews this product seems very shady. First when you plug it into your phone a message pops up asking if you need to download the app and takes you to the App Store. The app is called LUV-share and looks very outdated and many of the functions within the app doesn’t work. The overall reviews on the App Store are terrible. When I tried to download any of my pictures and videos it would only download a few into the folders I created and show me a error message. Overall, not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Bought this more than once!
customer_reviews.text: When you have over 4,000 pictures/videos and have to pay a fee of $2.99 every month for more iCloud space it gets pretty pricey. When I heard about this iPhone flash drive I jumped at the idea of cutting some expenses out of my life. I loved how easy it was to transfer all of my photos/videos into this flash drive! The only thing that you need to do is download an app and then transfer all of your information into the flash drive! Super easy and fast! Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy way to get extra on the fly storage for your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this USB drive at first, but was pleasantly surprised! Remove the case from your phone if you have one, plug it in and it automagically prompts you to download and install the app. From there you create a folder and select what photos you want copied. I like this better than plugging into iTunes and having to mess with it all. Once I have created a movie with my DJI app, it's easy to transfer to the computer for further editing or emailing/uploading. 5/5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Denverdude

customer_reviews.title: iPhone External Storage
customer_reviews.text: Item was promptly sent and carefully packaged. Instructions were in very small print, but readable. After loading the Y-Disk app, I was able to download frrom my phone/ I am used to the File Explorer in Windows and felt somewhat constrained by the apps choices on the iPhone. That may be an Apple limitation rather than the Y-Disk. I have yet to try loading my iPhone from my Win 10 laptop, but I don't forsee a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ray H

customer_reviews.title: Sent a new drive after issues with first one
customer_reviews.text: Review update right after return window: Had issues with the first drive and was sent a new one. —— Easy to use, intuitive USB drive. The only downside is that I had to take my case off of my phone temporarily for the connection to work, but not a big deal as I imagine all external drives probably have the same requirement. No more worries about having to delete pictures when my phone is full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick copying photos
customer_reviews.text: Transferring pictures and videos from an iPhone to a PC seems harder than it should be so I purchased a Kimiandi 128GB 3 in 1 high speed USB Flash drive. Just plug it into the lightning port and it prompts you a install the software and when you accept it sets up the install - couldn’t be simpler. The app allows you to quickly select photos and videos and then copy them to the drive. Price is good and I am pleased with the speed - each photo copied to the drive takes about 1 second.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: No cap or cover for USB
customer_reviews.text: I’m not giving a 5 star review due to the fact this has no cap or anything to put on the flash drive when not in use. Diet and debris can easily enter. I would not buy this again. It does well for storage, But what happens when you lose all your storage because of dust or debris’s enters the USB!?
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ross

customer_reviews.title: Junk - File Corruption, doesnt always tranfer files
customer_reviews.text: file Transfer was slow, (about 9MB/s) but that is not a huge problem as I didn't plan on using this except to offload files. so the 1hr+ for 30GB was fine. What was NOT OK is that about 1/3rd of the transferred files were corrupt. So I tried on a different phone and after waiting for that offload to finish (about 45 minutes), NO FILES were transferred to the USB drive. Glad I tested this before using it on a trip. Imagine losing all your vacation videos/pictures because you thought they were being offloaded to this piece of junk...
customer_reviews.author: 2MuchCoffee (AA)

customer_reviews.title: Very handy solution to save pics from iphone to computer
customer_reviews.text: My photos app downloader from the iphone never worked and I tried multiple solutions get them downloaded to my PC to clear up space on my icloud and iphone. It probably has something to do with a mac product to pc transfer which resulted in aborted downloads and I was getting frustrated. Also its an easy and convenient way to carry oodles of data around without bulky external drives. When I found this device it worked perfectly and I am happy I have an easy way to move files around now.
customer_reviews.author: Vishant Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, and Very Fast Transfer,
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive is indeed very quick at getting items off of you phone. I uploaded all of my pictures and videos to Prime afterwards as a back up. It literally took HOURS to upload 752 pictures, whereas the flash drive did it within minutes. I have no complaints. It could be made a little better, but the price point it’s phenomenal l have requested an exchange for it, because it’s missing 2 of the interchangeable tops.
customer_reviews.author: Minskin Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an easy way to transfer photos from my iPhone during vacations and road trips, and also when I'm moving them to the computer. This item is really easy to use, you download the free app, plug it in to the phone and choose the photos you wish to transfer. That's it, so simple, and when all the photos are downloaded, just plug it in to the USB port of the receiving unit. So for I've used it for both photos and videos with no problems. I can see myself using this a lot in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bluman

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product (and I have) and I would definitely buy this again. Shipping was fast and product quality is good/generic (feels like a simple flash drive you’d buy at Walmart). My only qualm would be that there’s no cap or case for it so I’m worried one of the ends will snap off-definitely can’t just throw in your bag and go. The app is nice and easy to use (don’t know why it has bad rating on App Store). Plays videos very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Marie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to get this product. I’ve hated losing photos from my phone in the past and the constant need to add space to the cloud backup storage is something I was bad about. This is easy to use and I get to select the photos I want to save, organize them into folders, and back up my contacts. I love it. I got 128 GB because I think it could be enough since I’m not saving every single meme and screenshot but the photos I want to save. Oh and I really like the usb connection on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic & Easy To Use Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kimiandy 128 GB (3-in-1) iPhone USB Flash Drive is a fantastic, simple to use external plug-in device that works flawlessly to copy items from your iPhone into its massive 128 GB storage capacity. Very simple to use--just download the free LUV-Share app from the Apple App Store, plug the drive into your iPhone and it immediately automatically loads and prompts you to select your options. Very fast transfer rate--I downloaded the App, plugged this little beauty in, and flawlessly copied 1705 photos in 15 minutes. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jack

customer_reviews.title: Easily backed up 15,000+ photos
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but I had to hop on and give this one a big thumbs up. I actually ordered one and it didn’t work (kept having errors). The company exchanged it very easily and I got my new one the next day. Tried it and it worked beautifully to quickly and easily transfer 15,855 photos and videos from my phone to my computer. This is a great product from a standup company and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Can only use up to 1/4 of the 128GB.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and tried using it. But I could write only up to 30GB of the 128GB. Any further file writes were corrupted. Reformat a couple times and the same issue encountered. I thought I just happened to receive a bad one, so I bought another one. The second one had the same symptom. Basically only 30GB can be used, which is about right for the $25 price. I had to return them both because I need about 90GB to 100GB of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ming L.

customer_reviews.title: Basically useless
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to transfer Word and Excel documents from my iPad to my PC, since Bluetooth doesn’t work. However, when I downloaded the app, LUV-share, it didn’t look or work the way the directions said that came with the drive. Even the icon that was specifically for photos didn’t let me copy them to the flash drive. Since I couldn’t get anything to copy to the drive, I returned it. The only good thing about it was it had a free return, so I got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great flash drive!
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to use, easily understood the instructions, and quickly saved thousands of my iPhone photos and videos. Highly recommend for that purpose! I was so impressed with the first one that I ended up purchasing 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: boomohr

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as promised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday. He was excited to see that it had a USB plug AND an Apple Lightning plug. He downloaded the app they said he needed and tried to put files on the drive. This item ONLY accepts photos, and it will not plug into the Lightning port unless he removes the case from his phone. Since his birthday was well after I ordered and received it, I can't return this item, so I'm stuck with it. This item was a total disappointment. THE ONE GOOD THING: it arrived well before I expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Cote

customer_reviews.title: Handy way to transfer files as well as store big files
customer_reviews.text: I bought this storage unit to be able to transfer files easily between my desktop and iPhone or iPad. It's easier than dealing with iCloud, plus my devices don't have that much memory. I downloaded some instructional videos, saved them on the iPhone flash drive using the USB port, then plugged the iPhone flash drive into my iPad and was able to watch the video. My only complaint is the app is a little confusing to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Robink

customer_reviews.title: Cool lil device
customer_reviews.text: The only off putting of this device is i have to take my case off to use it on my iphone 6s other than that i love it. I love that its universal and the luv share installs instantly after putting it in the phone. It fits snug and doesn't fall out. lets you see your storage as well as lets you make folders and sending stuff over is a piece of cake. I hope this lasts along time cause i love it so far. The USB stick is awesome!! I love how much it can store. I just wish the manual for it was easy...Kinda hard to figure out. Still thumbs up! Worth 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: BAMBOO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we don’t have internet access where we live. My husband bought a new phone but we needed to preserve pictures on his old one. Downloading the App from the App Store was easy, using the app to move pictures to this USB was super simple. I plugged it into the computer to confirm it took all pictures and videos. It worked!! Moved over 400 in about 5 minutes and still tons of space.
customer_reviews.author: TONI

customer_reviews.title: Storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to put my home videos on usb/lighting memory to make copies for all my family. They will play them back on a iPhone lightning connector. Seemed simple but but too many problems to list. Of several memory sticks different brands I have tried, this was the only one that would play all my video files. But this had a problem too. It is listed as 256 gig. I only got 32gig. Otherwise it is easy to use in every other way. Maybe it was a knock off. I really like the Luv-share software too. I need to buy 7 of these if they come with advertised memory.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible With iphone 5s As Stated
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. Bought this due to great reviews and description of item says works with iphone 5s. Lightning end is too wide to fit port on phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kate54

customer_reviews.title: Works for A Few Transfers Then Starts to Crap Out!!
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the reviews more carefully. Same thing happened for me. Transferred without any major issues the first 10 transfers. Then the Error messages began popping up. Every photo had the Error message pop up and that was the end of story!! I’ve got over 3800 photos on my iPhone!! I’m not taking ANY chances of losing them so back this flash drive goes!!
customer_reviews.author: Blupaws7

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I had over 10,000 pictures on my iphone and either had to delete pictures or increase my iCloud storage and pay more per month, this was a much better and easier alternative. It's so simple to use, just plug it into your phone, download the app and copy pictures to the device. It even comes with a USBC adapter so I can plug it in easily to my macbook. Definetly worth the expense!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Gets warm when adding video files; One plug always exposed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim and found it very easy to use. The capacity is perfect for my needs. My concerns are two-fold (1) there's no way to set it so that no plugs are exposed--either the lightning plug is exposed, or the USB plug is exposed. (2) It got very warm the first time I downloaded a video from my phone onto it. I expected some warmth, but it was hotter than I expected. It seemed to do better with subsequent videos. The first video was the largest, so perhaps that had something to do with it. Overall , though, I've been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed results.
customer_reviews.text: I bought to transfer files & pictures from my iPhone 5S to a desktop PC. The instructions are hard to understand and read due to extremely fine print. I have been able to move pictures ONLY, it doesn’t show any files on internal HD, & no way to address them except “file library”! Very disappointed with it, other than ability to transfer pictures. I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ed Mont

customer_reviews.title: Must have for mobile phone that have small storage space
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent flash drive for IPhone 6S plus. Very easy to use. There is an instruction in package. I was able transfer data from phone to flash drive by using a third party apps Y-Disk.
customer_reviews.author: TheTranClan

customer_reviews.title: Does what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: The Product Itself worked as advertised and I’m happy with my purchase. Easily downloaded all my Pics & Video on my iPhone using the Luv App. My problem is with Microsoft Photos that doesn’t work with either my Apple Phone or this iPhone Flash Drive now that Windows 10 has been updated. the Photos program recognizes the files and then just freezes. I was able to do a work around free up memory on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: flagdogs

customer_reviews.title: It does work fine but does need some connection improvements
customer_reviews.text: 1) The Lightning connector side does not reach the connector on I phone 7 with Otterbox cove had to modify cover to fit. 2) connectors do not lock in place when installing you have to hold it when connecting to keep it from sliding back in. Update: I found that the SanDisk 64GB USB 3.0 iXpand Mini Flash Drive with Lightning Connector for iPhones, iPads & Computers (SDIX40N-064G) works much better!
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, very useful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flash drive. My husband, my son, and I all had hundreds of photos saved on our iPhones that took up precious memory, and backing up the photos on iCloud or Google Photos took too long. This flash drive worked amazingly fast however: I downloaded nearly a thousand pictures onto it in around 15 min, which is ten times faster than iCloud or Google. The app that goes along with the flash drive is a little bare-bones, but it works. I definitely recommend it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Alvarez Mira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flash Drive for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Both the 128gb stick for iOS and its accompanying app work excellently right out of the box, without requiring prior knowledge. An amazingly low price for this wonderful item makes backing up your iPhone and Android and PC freeing valuable space on the phones a snap: the app lets you choose what you want backed up and gone from the Apple phone -- and even offers to use the phone's camera for pics that will be placed into the stick immediately. All in all, a great value for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Maleko HooManaWanui

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little device! Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Transfer speed is great! I was able to transfer 1250 pics and vids to my backup drive. Now I don’t have to rely on iTunes to back up my pictures. I had to wait as it downloaded some of the pics from the cloud, but took roughly 20 min to do so. Plugged into my computer it took about 10 min to transfer the files over. Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase. Highly recommend this device! Thank you for helping me transfer my pics and vids to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive ease of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use out of the box. The slider however does not lock and can easily become disconnect. I bought this after my IPad wouldnt turn on a few times and sensed it may crash soon. I kept getting warnings that I could corrupt the USB if O didnt leave it connected. Good speed transfer. You can take pictures and video directly to the USB device. The app is really good. It allows you to backup and restore contacts.
customer_reviews.author: D. STURGEON

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Up and running within minutes! All I did was download the app from the App Store and inserted the flash drive into my iPhone. I’ve tested downloading documents to the drive from my email. It seems fairly simple. The only flaw I’ve noticed is that the rose gold part isn’t stiff enough. Inserting the flash drive was a bit challenging trying to keep it steady so it connected. Other than that I think I will be getting my monies worth with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lezly & Liam’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this flash drive to connect with my iphone. This must happen frequently because the product booklet even gives some suggestions on what to do if this happens. Even following those instructions it did not work. Unfortunately I ordered this flash drive in early spring and did not open the package until late spring since I was so busy at work. I have certainly learned my lesson about checking things out early. I missed the deadline to be able to return it. This is my first time being unhappy with an Amazon product, I guess that is why I was so cavalier about not checking it out earlier. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Cute little storage and works with my phone too!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and it seems to be working fine. I am transferring files and having no problems. It is a little funny with the Apple plug on the other end, but that is also what will be cool if and when I can use that. It is a cute little thing and I got it on deal days for Amazon, so that is what prompted me to purchase. I would buy again for my photography business.
customer_reviews.author: Thankful

customer_reviews.title: Super quick set up, easy to use, with tons of storage space!
customer_reviews.text: The 128GB 3 in 1 Multi-Function USB Flash Drive is GREAT! I pulled it out of the box and plugged it into my iPhone. My phone pulled up the App Store with the app ready to download. I pressed GET. The app downloaded within seconds. I was using the flash drive from package to phone to computer in less than a minute. AMAZING!! I love the sleek and convenient styling, as well. The outer materials compare to other flash drives on the market. I highly recommend this product. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a while to find a reasonable drive that I could use to transfer the music from my computer to my iPod (yes, some of us still have them!). Since a lot of my music is now on an android phone and a work PC, it was so slick to have all the needed adaptors and needed storage space on one compact and easy to sue device. Thanks to letting me keep my '80's music alive and rocking'
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: good product, app need to be updated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a Christmas gift. It arrived in a timely manner and worked well with the app to transfer pics from my husbands phone to his computer. The phone updated a few months later and now the device doesn't work as well but I'm sure they will update the app soon and it will be working smoothly again. I would recommend this product for anyone wanting to get more storage space for their phones or to easily transfer pics between devices :)
customer_reviews.author: Del27

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive works really well! I got it for my wife because she always runs out of storage on her iPhone from taking pictures and videos of our kids. It makes transferring off these files so easy. You need to download their app to start transferring the files but it was a breeze for her. I'd recommend this product to others with Apple products. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Cj Bautista

customer_reviews.title: this is a necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an item like this! It is so difficult and clumsy to move large numbers of photos, videos etc from an iphone! This product was a breeze to use and is invaluable!!! The only problem that I had was that my phone kept saying that is did not recognize external storage. I took off the phone case and it worked great. I guess it was too thick to make a good connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Amazon Website was misleading
customer_reviews.text: I intended to use this product to store digital pictures. I ordered it because the description on the Amazon website stated that it was a USB 3 device. The product package said that it was only USB 2. That is the reason that I have returned the flash drive to Amazon for a refund. Additionally the instructions that came with the device were very hard to read and confusing but I was able to get it to work but only after I connected it with an item that came with a previous purchase. In general I was not satisfied with this product. See attached image.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Affordable additional storage
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product looks professional. You do need to download an additional app to your smart phone to use the product. However, the app downloads quickly and it's easy to use. The flash drive is small enough to carry with you when you travel and it's quick to move items (videos, photos, pdf files) from the phone to the drive. I've enjoyed it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Best1263

customer_reviews.title: Junk DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this has a four star rating...most of the questions are responded to as " i don't know" I bought it, it seemed to work, until I tried to access my photos - GONE, ALL GONE, it removed it from my phone, and then POOF - It is junk I lost hundreds of photos.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Vipond

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It made me download a second app “luv” which recognized the USB. However to Transfer the photos you need the dual magic flash app which did not work at all. It continuously told me the USB was not plugged in even though it was so basically this is a useless piece of metal that does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Purchase only if you want to add to junk pile
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. I purchased this drive based on over 1,000 reviews. I even read them. This flash drive does not work and is not easy to use. It copied 50 photos from over 4,000. I couldn’t tell it did anything at first until I inserted it into my laptop. This is junk. Amazon should know better.
customer_reviews.author: The Professional

customer_reviews.title: A lot of storage for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This USB flash drive for my iPhone 6s is everything they advertised it to be. However, the user instructions need to be a lot more detailed. I learned how to use it by trial and error - mostly error at first. I still haven’t figured out how to transfer existing photos on my phone to the flash drive and that was one of the reasons I got it. I now plug it into the phone as I am taking photos and they go directly onto the flash drive, saving valuable space on my phone. For the price and the amount of gigs, I highly recommend this for a great way to save storage on an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: FL Minzy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, just plug it into your iPhone and the option to download the app pops right up! The program is super straightforward, just choose which files to move and put your phone down to let it copy over. My 250gb phone is full since I do video work, so this drive is helping me move my files! I don’t know how I haven’t had one of these before! My only con so far is that the drive doesn’t click into place on other side, so you have to hold the slider while you plug it into pc or phone but that’s really not a big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to figure out how to use
customer_reviews.text: What I received the first time was not what I ordered. I returned it, asking for the brand I had ordered originally, and received the same thing again!!! The instruction book is not only in such fine print that I couldn’t even read it with my glasses; but also very difficult to follow the very confusing directions!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wright

customer_reviews.title: A good solution to getting data off Ios devices
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive worked as advertised. The ios app used to move data from the IOS device to the drive interfaced well with the iphone/ipad. No problem getting the data (images) on to the storage device. One issue I did have was the USB side of the drive didn't lock. You have to push the usb drive in and the lever-slide at the same time, which is a bit awkward to do. But again, once you fully insert the usb drive, the device works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice device, works well, but will not do full iPhone backup...
customer_reviews.text: The device works well, prompts you to install the needed app when you plug it into your iPhone, and allows you to backup photos and contacts quickly. I was hoping that the device would do a complete iPhone backup just as easily, so I could avoid itunes and my laptop. My bad...I should have done more research before purchasing. On the hardware side, I like the dual lightning/usb connector, and the included micro usb adaptor...
customer_reviews.author: SadInSantaBarbara

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Flash Drive!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a flash drive that I could save data & pictures on from my phone. The best thing about this Flash drive is that once I've copied the data & pictures from my phone, I can then transfer them to my tablet or laptop with the USB that is provided on the flash drive. It is a 3-in-1 that comes with the attachment for an android phone & and for an IPhone. Most of all it is so great to have 128GB available to store so much more data & pictures. It was worth the money and it look great. I going to purchase another one for my husband. It's a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LadyTweety13

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike! It install instantly on my iPad6...I was also IMPRESSED with how clear the image and video I uploaded to the usb. I was also able to upload the movie to my iPad6 with no problems. I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT. *You will need to upload the LUV-Share App. DO NOT be worried about the STARS given on the LUV-Share App. It worked Perfectly on my iPad6. Happy Customer❣
customer_reviews.author: VLuna

customer_reviews.title: It really works well on my iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. My iPhone X recognized it easily (after removing the case). I was able to backup my photos immediately. The app asked me the permission to download the files on iCloud. The device is great with photos and videos being the most space occupying files. I am still trying to figure out if I can access the files on my iBooks. Will buy again when I run out of space and for my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Nad in Napa

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just got this item in the mail today. So simple to use, plug it into your phone, download the app, then begin downloading your pictures. I had over 3000 photos I was worried I could lose. No worries of that now. The value of your money for this little gem can't be beat. Thank you for making a product this easy to use and giving me a piece of mind that my photos will not just vanish one day. I will try to come back and review this again in a few weeks once I have used it for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Babirad

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR STORAGE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product! Who know they could make a flash drive directly compatible with iPhones? This flash drive is very easy to use and stored all of my photos/videos. I was running out of storage on my phone, so instead of having to purchase iCloud storage (where you pay monthly) I have it completely stored on the drive. The size is perfect, and it comes with an additional attachment to be able to work with other phones, as well. The only thing I would suggest to make this product a 5-star would be to add a cover of some sort so that the extension of the drive doesn't break off.
customer_reviews.author: April Justine

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Still getting to know it. So far, not so good. It crashed after 78 pictures and would not save any more. Runs very slowly. I estimate several hours to download 3000 pictures, assuming it does not crash again. Did not come with an adapter for Samsung phones, so can only use with iphone.
customer_reviews.author: R. C Speth

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: I love the drive very easy to use Like most people I have 100,s or 1000’s of pictures To down load or backup Just plug it in open app and backup Sort by year or just pick the ones you want to save You can make a file in the app to save it to and download It on a flash drive or hard drive in your computer
customer_reviews.author: Bloodstone

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Quick, and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I am an absolute picture hoarder, to the point by poor iPhone could no longer store the over 20,000 pictures I have on my phone (from just two years, whoops). With so many pictures, airdropping them or trying to copy them one by one seemed exhausting, so I never wanted to deal with that. I stumbled upon this and was SO excited to find a solution. It came very quick through prime and was in great shape. Was very simple to use and quickly transferred my pictures! I did around 1,500 a time to transfer to my laptop and had no issues, each transfer only taking a maximum of like 10 minutes. VERY impressed and satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few from here and they are flawless! Great price and great flash drive! I have used others in the past and have ran into several issues which becomes frustrating. Look no further! I don’t write a lot of reviews but I had to with this one. This is my second review and I can’t express how awesome this flash drive is! So fast, easy to use/understand and at an excellent price! Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Sailor89

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and FAST moves/copies @e LUV it 😎
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the setup and the fact that I received an adapter for Android Phones as well. This is truly an easy to use device fore the price. The auto-load app install is perfect for my wife. It was an easy install for her and the device moves files so easy and faster than my device from hoo-too. 2e love the device and highly recommend it to beginners. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: Plug it into the phone. Wait a sec as it guides you to the app page and specific app. Install the app. Go to videos on your phone, select, and hit the bottom right corner with the two overlapping squares. Say copy to external storage. Unplug from phone and plug into USB drive on your PC/mac. Copy over. Done.
customer_reviews.author: Tim arthur

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for one of these devices.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful device to transfer files to and from your MBP and an iPad or iPhone. The USB 3.0 connects is valuable for those of us who have devices that require this type of connection. The connection to the iPad and iPhone is secure and the USC connector to the Macintosh computers is snug. This is the fastest and easiest way to transfer files between one's computer and an iPhone or iPad. Great value. / R.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an easy to setup and use flash drive for my wife. She has a tendency to save too many photos and videos. This drive makes it easy for her to move the files from her iPad onto our family computer with a terabyte drive. This is much more cost efficient than paying for Apple's cloud service.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Morgan

product_meta.title: USB Flash Drive 128GB [3-in-1] Compatible iPhone, Kimiandy USB 3.0 Adapter External Storage Memory Stick Adapter Expansion Compatible iPad/iPod/Mac/Android/PC/iOS
product_meta.description:
Color:128G PINKiPhone flash drive 128GB
- The usb flash drive is not only is compatible with Windows/Android/iOS, but also Compatible with iPhone X / iPhone 8 / iPhone 7 /iPhone 7 plus / iPhone SE / iPhone 6s / iPhone 6 / iPhone 6s plus / iPhone 6 plus / iPhone 5s / iPhone 5c / iPhone 5 and so on. A perfect flash drive for iPhone and Android users. (not compatible with type c)

- Encryption software to password protect files, so you can share content while keeping sensitive files secure (APP only support iPhone/iPad)

-package :
1* usb flash drive 
1* Instructions 
1* Anti-dirty waterproof bag (In the outer layer of the package)

Format supported
Music: m4a, aiff, caf, mp3, wav
Image: gif, jpg, png,jpeg
Video: avi, flv, m4v, mkv, mov, mp4, rmvb
Document: doc, ppt, xls, xlsx, pdf, html, txt

NOTE
* DOWNLOAD ONTHE APP STORE SEARCH "Y Disk" USE
* Android phone: if your phone can not work,You need go to open mobile phone set open OTG connection
* No support “HEIC” & No support type-c port
feature_bullets: 【ACCESS SECURITY】Lock Flash Drive via fingerprints and /or password on setting to secure your whole storage, or Lock selected files with password. Perfect to protect individual privacy

【FORMAT FRIENDLY STREAMING APP】The free APP supports all major video and music formats so you can stream directly from the iphone flash drive, Saving you precious space and time. Record videos and take photos directly to the iOS memory stick via APP

【Powerful Storage】 USB Storage Flash Drive, fast transfer speed, you can directly record your photo / video to the flash drive 128GB of external memory expansion, can quickly release the iPhone / iPad memory.
【One Touch backup】 Backup all contacts/images/audios/videos at one click.
【COMPATIBILITY】Ensure 100% compatible and can be used as iPhone 7 6 6s Plus 6 Plus 5s 5c flash drive, iPad Air Air 2 mini flash drive.
